item.title: Getting Started with MERN Stack Part 1
item.author: kumar.alankar92@gmail.com (Alankar Kumar)
item.description: Hello! Web development has evolved a lot with recent updates to ECMA script specifications. For those who have heard the term MEAN Stack and are confused as to what does MERN mean. It is just React – R for the Angular – A in the stack, the rest being MongoDB, ExpressJS,NodeJS. We won’t dive into the pros and cons of React or it’s relative advantages and disadvantages to Angular, because that’s another level of opinionated cacophony of technology loyalists.
